text.0: 3. False. An estimated 2.5 out of every 100,000 women and girls were killed in #Kenya in 2016. #InfoFinder
text.1: 2. True. According to 2016 data from the Demographic and Health Survey, 26% of South African women who had ever had a partner had experienced physical, sexual and/or emotional violence.
text.2:
The correct answers to our #miniquiz are: 

1. An estimated 18% of women who were aged 15 to 49 in 2016/17 had been victims of female genital mutilation or cutting in #Nigeria.
